title: Baby Registry - Little troublemaker on the way!
heading: C√©line & Paola's baby registry
subheading: The big moving day is coming! Our little squatter is soon being evicted from mom's luxury studio (with 24/7 room service, central heating, and all-inclusive placenta comfort). Help us welcome this tiny tenant to the outside world by choosing a gift or contributing to our baby fund!
